title: Freedom-loving HKers congratulate Taiwan's Dr Tsai Ing-Wen

replies.msg:
The people of Taiwan have voiced out loud and clear with their vote: they refuse to be colonialized by the totalitarian CCP government and will continue to embrace and value their freedom!

Us freedom-loving HKers congratulate Dr Tsai and her party, the DPP, for her victory and we will continue to stand until we may vote for our own leader!
